refnamediv.refpurpose: Should image URIs be resolved against xml:base?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zeor, relative URIs (in, for example fileref attributes) will be used in the generated output. Otherwise, the URIs will be made absolute with respect to the base URI.
Note that the stylesheets calculate (and use) the absolute form for some purposes, this only applies to the resulting output.
